docs.snippet: The blockbuster movie "Frozen," a Walt Disney Animation Studios musical fairy tale about the bond between two royal sisters in an icy Scandinavian kingdom, won the Academy Award on Sunday for best animated feature film....
docs.lead_paragraph: The blockbuster movie "Frozen," a Walt Disney Animation Studios musical fairy tale about the bond between two royal sisters in an icy Scandinavian kingdom, won the Academy Award on Sunday for best animated feature film.

docs.snippet: Disney's fairytale musical "Frozen" has won the Oscar for best animated feature....
docs.lead_paragraph: Disney's fairytale musical "Frozen" has won the Oscar for best animated feature.

headline.main: 'Frozen' Wins Oscar for Animated Feature Film
headline.print_headline: 'Frozen' Wins Oscar for Animated Feature Film

docs.snippet: Jared Leto, the former teen heartthrob who left Hollywood to become a rock star, won the best supporting actor Oscar on Sunday in his return to movies as an HIV positive transgender woman in "Dallas Buyers Club."...
docs.lead_paragraph: Jared Leto, the former teen heartthrob who left Hollywood to become a rock star, won the best supporting actor Oscar on Sunday in his return to movies as an HIV positive transgender woman in "Dallas Buyers Club."

headline.main: Jared Leto Wins Supporting Actor Oscar for 'Dallas Buyers Club'
headline.print_headline: Jared Leto Wins Supporting Actor Oscar for 'Dallas Buyers Club'

docs.snippet: "To all the dreamers out there watching this tonight in places like the Ukraine and Venezuela: We are here and as you struggle to make your dreams happen, to live the impossible, we're thinking of you tonight." — Best Supporting Actor Oscar ...
docs.lead_paragraph: "To all the dreamers out there watching this tonight in places like the Ukraine and Venezuela: We are here and as you struggle to make your dreams happen, to live the impossible, we're thinking of you tonight." — Best Supporting Actor Oscar winner Jared Leto, sending a message to two countries in turmoil, places where at least some broadcasts of the Academy Awards were blocked Sunday evening.

docs.snippet: List of winners at Sunday's 86th annual Academy Awards presented by the Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences....
docs.lead_paragraph: List of winners at Sunday's 86th annual Academy Awards presented by the Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences.

docs.snippet: June Squibb nominated for best supporting actress in "Nebraska" tells Reuters TV the movie offered a script that "every actress would want to play." Rough Cut (no reporter narration)....
docs.lead_paragraph: June Squibb nominated for best supporting actress in "Nebraska" tells Reuters TV the movie offered a script that "every actress would want to play." Rough Cut (no reporter narration).

headline.main: "It's the kind of script every actress would want to play" - Oscar nominee June Squibb on "Nebraska"
headline.sub: "It's the kind of script every actress would want to play" - Oscar nominee June Squibb on "Nebraska"

docs.snippet: "If you win tonight, I think we should bring you the Oscar." — Oscar host Ellen DeGeneres to last year's Oscar winner Jennifer Lawrence, who DeGeneres ribbed for her penchant for falling down at awards shows....
docs.lead_paragraph: "If you win tonight, I think we should bring you the Oscar." — Oscar host Ellen DeGeneres to last year's Oscar winner Jennifer Lawrence, who DeGeneres ribbed for her penchant for falling down at awards shows.

docs.snippet: Lupita Nyong'o's screen debut in the film "12 Years a Slave" didn't go unnoticed -- asked what an Oscar would mean to her, she replied with "a lot." Rough Cut (no reporter narration)....
docs.lead_paragraph: Lupita Nyong'o's screen debut in the film "12 Years a Slave" didn't go unnoticed -- asked what an Oscar would mean to her, she replied with "a lot." Rough Cut (no reporter narration).

headline.main: Asked what an Oscar win would mean to her, Lupita responds with "a lot"
headline.sub: Asked what an Oscar win would mean to her, Lupita responds with "a lot"

docs.snippet: Jared Leto wasn't just thinking about himself after winning the best supporting actor Academy Award on Sunday night — his thoughts veered from his mother, the populations of Ukraine and Venezuela and even the reporters who were covering his ...
docs.lead_paragraph: Jared Leto wasn't just thinking about himself after winning the best supporting actor Academy Award on Sunday night — his thoughts veered from his mother, the populations of Ukraine and Venezuela and even the reporters who were covering his Oscar glory.

headline.main: Jared Leto in Generous Mood After Acting Oscar Win
headline.print_headline: Jared Leto in Generous Mood After Acting Oscar Win
